item.title: 01 - Welcome to My Blog
item.description: Hi! Hello! Welcome! This is my blog. Tada! My name is myl3z (miles) and I like cyber security. This blog will be my personal blog about cyber security related topics. Since I’m in love with Web development the content will kinda focus on that area. Let’s see! Hope you like the posts :) Well, then, have a good one.
